name: I'm Where
description:
The game is set in the World of Mysria, where you will explore and solve puzzles to find out why you are there.

And more importantly, why no-one else is.

It's my first ever game, and also the first time using Lua. I made it with the LOVE engine, which is quite nice.

CONTROLS
WASD to move
Space to pick up keys and to read bookcases and signs.
